channel.title: Posts on Jordan Herzstein
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jordan Herzstein

item.title: Do not look at the Sun
item.description: Do not look directly at the sun today… or tomorrow… or ever… just don’t do it.

item.title: New light theme on daylight savings plus I hate daylight savings
item.description: I added a light theme so it’s easier for some users to read. Also I hate daylight savings.

item.title: Skiff is Dead ðŸ¤¡
item.description: Lesson #1: Proton king. Lesson #2: Don’t trust American Silicon Valley Crypto Bros. Lesson #3: Switching seems to be the primary throughline of my website.

item.title: Hugo and other site changes
item.description: Hugo is a very good static site generator.

item.title: nyaa_menu
item.description: I made a lazy web scraping tool for collecting anime and manga while I was bored.

item.title: My Little Techy Projects Summer 2023
item.description: I did some fun stuff this summer, including hacking my switch, switching to Qubes OS, and switching to OpenWRT on my router. Overall, a lot of switching.

item.title: Mapping Caps Lock to Esc and CTRL in Xorg
item.description: Guide on switching keymaps using xkb in Xorg
